message:
SYSTEM: Re-engineer_NOR.pdf: Página 42
Ouput: Ontology Generated
•
The ontology generated will be based on the lightweight ontology architectural 
pattern (AP-LW-01). Each thesaurus term is mapped to a class. 
•
A subClassOf relation is defined between the new classes for the BT/NT 
relation. 
•
A relatedClass relation is defined between the new classes for the RT relation. 
•
For the UF/USE relations we use the logical pattern proposed by Corcho et al. 
suggested as best practice in the context of this antipattern: the tendency to 
declare two classes equivalent when in fact their labels simply express 
synonym.
PR-NOR Example
42
synonym.
© A Method for Re-engineering Non-Ontological Resources for Building Ontologies 
Boris Villazón-Terrazas, Mari Carmen Suárez Figueroa
speaker: SYSTEM
